product_name: Arctic Ice Alaskan Refreezable Ice Pack
long_description: An ice pack made from non-toxic, plant-derived material, the Arctic Ice Alaskan Refreezable Ice Pack keeps your food and beverages icy fresh during picnics or afternoon trips to the lake. Plant-derived PureTemp(TM) freezing liquid is designed to stay frozen longer than ice or "blue" ice substitutes and can be re-frozen again and again. Sealed package means no mess when it melts.
short_description: An ice pack made from non-toxic, plant-derived material, the Arctic Ice Alaskan Refreezable Ice Pack keeps your food and beverages icy fresh during picnics or afternoon trips to the lake.
